title: Celebrating a new client signing
context: Tell your network that you just landed a massive new contract.

content.bestLine: Just landed a massive new contract!

neutral.text: I'm excited to announce a new partnership
A new contract is in place
Our team has landed a new deal
I'm looking forward to working with our new client
A new agreement has been reached
Our company is growing with a new contract

informal.text: Just scored a huge new client
We're stoked to have a new project
I'm psyched about our new partnership
We've got a new gig lined up
Our team is thrilled about the new contract
I'm so excited to start working with our new client
We're going to crush this new project
This new contract is a game-changer

formal.text: We are pleased to announce a new client partnership
Our company has successfully secured a new contract
A new agreement has been formally established
We look forward to collaborating with our new client
Our team is committed to delivering exceptional results for our new client
This new contract represents a significant opportunity for growth

slang.text: We just landed a sick new client
This new contract is straight fire
We're low-key excited about our new partnership
Our new client is a total boss
We're gonna kill it with this new project

patterns.meaning: to express excitement and confirmation of a new client
to express enthusiasm and importance of the new contract

lines.speaker: John
lines.text: Hey, have you heard the news?

lines.speaker: John
lines.text: We just landed a massive new contract!

dialogs.description: Sharing the news with a friend

lines.speaker: Sarah
lines.text: I just got a new client and I'm super excited

lines.speaker: Mike
lines.text: That's awesome! What's the project about?

lines.speaker: Sarah
lines.text: It's a big one, and I think it's going to be a lot of fun
